title: blue essence mission question
body: So on my main I got a mission for 14k blue essence but on this guy I did not get any missions for blue essence even though  i spent ip on runes before the changes. What is the reason for this?

replies.body: Complete the missions then go to loot and open the blue things
Could be bugged, some people have reported they arent getting the "quests" to obtain their owed Blue Essence.
